aboutMe.intro: I love turning ideas into tangible solutions. IT allows me to combine creativity with technical expertise. Solving problems and building something new is what drives me – this is exactly what fascinates me about the world of programming.
aboutMe.location: Based in Woltersdorf near Berlin, I am available for both remote and on-site work.
aboutMe.new_skills: I enjoy learning new technologies because every new skill opens new ways to solve problems and allows me to approach projects more efficiently.
aboutMe.problem_solving: I always start by seeing the big picture, set priorities and apply proven methods. With complex problems I make sure progress continues by preparing plan-B solutions in parallel, work flexibly alone or in a team, and take learnings from every task to find more efficient solutions.

skillSet.headline: Expertise
skillSet.skills_text: I have strong knowledge in frontend development with HTML, CSS and JavaScript as well as modern Material Design. I also work confidently with TypeScript, Angular, Git and REST APIs. On top of that, I have experience with agile methods such as Scrum and put a strong focus on continuous learning and a growth mindset in order to evolve and adopt new technologies quickly.
skillSet.skill_contact_me: I deliberately list only areas where I am truly rock solid. I have zero hesitation when it comes to new tools – I experiment a lot on my own and continuously expand my stack.

projects.explore: Take a look around. This is the best way to get a feeling for how I build things.
projects.join_explain: A task manager based on the Kanban principle. Create and organize tasks via drag & drop – and assign users and categories.
projects.sharkie_explain: A 2D game about the little shark called Sharkie. You guide him through the underwater world and defeat his enemies. This project shows object-oriented programming in action – from character behavior to game mechanics.
